author: danceratopz
content:
Thanks for raising this! It's not you, definitely a bug. I made an issue for it for now. No need to check the details, but for every module you collect, you'll have one additional incorrectly reported "deselected test":
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/issues/533

content: Hey, did you get an answer anywhere to this? Sounds like a good discussion point for the rollcall (https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1025) ?
